level.text: Any person aggrieved by a final action of the Director denying, revoking, or suspending a license may file with the Office of Administrative Hearings a written demand for a hearing, as provided in ยง 5(j) of the Act (D.C. Official Code ยง 7-2804(j)) and in accordance with the rules of procedure of the Office of Administrative Hearings (1 DCMR ยง500 et seq.).
